name: Food Truck Wars
description:
How to play

Pick a name, pick a truck and pick a level then drive with [WASD] and boost with [Shift].  Your food truck only has limited capacity and there are a lot of hungry peeps in town.  (They would love 3 snacks each if you can manage it).

Head back to a loading bay when you run out of supplies and restock to continue your run.

Having the most loyal customers in the end certainly helps but it is no guarantee of a win given the chaos of a typical food fight.

Every round you are battling against someone who played the game in the past.  Can you get to their customers before they do?  Can you build a loyal following that will rally to you in the final battle?

Pre-existing third party assets used:

Unity

GUI PRO Kit - Casual Game

Tiny Car Controller

Houdini

Houdini Truck Tool (Lightly modified for food truck)

Indie Pixels City from this tutorial
